sentence.Network_en: Then at last the votary of venus found words to thank the goddess.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个时候,维纳斯的信徒才想起来向维纳斯女神感谢了一番.

sentence.Network_en: Greek & Roman mythology a priest or votary of Bacchus.
sentence.Network_cn: (希腊 和 罗马神话)酒神巴克斯的牧师或信仰者.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... derive from:v. 得自, 由来, 衍生 15。 votary ：n. 信仰者 17。 deify:v. 神化,崇拜 18。.
votarist 崇拜者votary 支持者vote against 投票反对

GRE逆序_馆档网 ... rotary 旋转的，转动的 votary 崇拜者，热心支持者 tributary 支流（的），进贡（的）.

list.abs: votaries of peace , disarmament , etc., 致力于和平 , 裁军等的人.
牛津大学英语词典 ... votaries of peace,disarmament,etc 致力于和平、 裁军等的人 * votaries of golf 高尔夫球迷.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin vot- 'vowed' (from the verb vovere) + -ary

means.word_mean: 1. one bound by vows to a religion or life of worship or service;
2. a priest or priestess (or consecrated worshipper) in a non-Christian religion or cult;
3. a devoted (almost religiously so) adherent of a cause or person or activity;

auth_sentence.content: Harold implored the help of the relic whose sworn votary he was.
auth_sentence.res_content: Harold implored the help of the relic whose sworn votary he was.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Harold implored the help of the relic whose sworn votary he was.
